Html:
Hello there,

I downloaded and installed the Shader Effect build task and followed steps to install the templates to this location ( on a WinXP machine):
﻿﻿C:\Documents and Settings\<MyUsername>\My Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Templates\

I then restarted visual studio 20120 (Ultimate) but there are no templates in the Project->New menu.

What am I doing wrong (if anything)?

Best regards,
